mapper.select: SELECT todm.orderNo , todm.orderType , todm.orderCnt , todm.orderPrice , todm.paymentType , todm.paymentTotalPrice , todm.addr , todm.addrDetail , todm.viewType , todm.regUser , todm.regDt , todm.updUser , todm.updDt FROM tbOrderMaster todm WHERE todm.orderNo = #{orderNo} AND todm.viewType = '01'

SELECT todp.seq , todp.orderNo , todp.optionNo , todp.orderCnt , todp.optionNm , todp.productNm , todp.discountPrice , todp.discountRate , todp.totalPrice , todp.viewType , todp.regUser , todp.regDt , todp.updUser , todp.updDt
, todm.orderType , todm.orderCnt , todm.orderPrice , todm.paymentType , todm.paymentTotalPrice , todm.addr , todm.addrDetail FROM tbOrderProduct todp INNER JOIN tbOrderMaster todm ON todp.orderNo = todm.orderNo INNER JOIN tbProductOption tpdo ON tpdo.optionNo = todp.optionNo INNER JOIN tbProductMaster tpdm ON tpdm.productNo = tpdo.productNo WHERE todp.orderNo = #{orderNo} AND todp.viewType = '01'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbOrderMaster ( orderType, orderCnt, orderPrice, paymentType, paymentTotalPrice, addr, addrDetail, viewType, regUser, regDt ) VALUES ( #{orderType}, #{orderCnt}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '01', #{loginMemNo}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO tbOrderProduct ( orderNo, optionNo, orderCnt, optionNm, productNm, discountPrice, discountRate, totalPrice, viewType, regUser, regDt ) SELECT #{orderNo}, tpdo.optionNo, #{orderCnt}, tpdo.optionNm, tpdm.productNm, NULL, NULL, tpdm.totalPrice, '01', #{loginMemNo}, NOW() FROM tbProductOption tpdo INNER jOIN tbProductMaster tpdm ON tpdo.productNo = tpdm.productNo WHERE tpdo.optionNo = #{optionNo}
